entry.title: Photos Post 35: Special Events (after 1975), Part 27
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 5 Photos of the special event 1912-0000 Series F, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 5 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 5 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: Collection 1912.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
